mapper.select: SELECT table_name tableName FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema= (select database()) ${ignoreTableName}

SELECT column_name columnName, data_type dataType, column_comment columnComment,ordinal_position ordinalPosition ,(case when column_key = 'PRI' then '1' else '0' end) as isPk , is_nullable isNullable FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = (SELECT DATABASE()) AND table_name = #{tableName} AND table_name NOT LIKE 'qrtz_%' AND table_name NOT LIKE 'gen_%' ORDER BY ordinal_position
